short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jersey Shore Family Vacation is BACK with new episodes on MTV every Thursday… we mean every Jerzday!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jersey Shore Family Vacation is BACK with new episodes on MTV every Thursday… we mean every Jerzday! To celebrate, we’re helping you OFFICIALLY turn your Thursdays into JERZdays.
 
🦆 Stress Reliever
Whenever life has you feeling down, just remember that Jersey Shore exists, and that Thursdays can always be Jerzdays.
 
🍝 Instant Meatball Power
Do you ever sit down and ask yourself “What Would Snooki Do?” Well this extension will give you all the meatball power you need… just by turning your Thursdays into Jerzdays.
 
💪 G.T.L.
Gym, tan, let’s turn your Thursdays into Jerzdays.
 
📆 Reminder
MTV’s Jerzdays app is a great reminder that when you’re part of the Jersey Shore Fam… every Thursday is Jerzday! Catch new episodes of Jersey Shore Family Vacation every Jerzday at 8/7c on MTV.
